xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages package¶

Submodules¶

xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make module¶

class xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make.BaseHelloWorldText(components=None, style=None, id=None, parent=None, name=None, css=None, fonts=None, prefix=None, class_=None, type=None, contentID=None, repeat=1, title=None, url=None, template=None, editable=False, adapter=None, selector=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xierpa3.components.column.Column

C¶

alias of Constants

buildBlock(b)¶

Build a content base class. Inherited by specific HelloWorld... classes that define the method <b>self.helloWorldText(b). In this example the CSS parameter are still defined inside the block. Different from the real usage of BluePrint API parameter, that allow modification from including components or inheriting components.

class xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make.HelloWorldHome(components=None, style=None, id=None, parent=None, name=None, css=None, fonts=None, prefix=None, class_=None, type=None, contentID=None, repeat=1, title=None, url=None, template=None, editable=False, adapter=None, selector=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make.BaseHelloWorldText

Private method. Inheriting from BaseHelloWorldText component, the class name generated by @self.getClassName()@ results in @HelloWorldHome@. Color is different per page.

class xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make.HelloWorldPages(components=None, style=None, id=None, parent=None, name=None, css=None, fonts=None, prefix=None, class_=None, type=None, contentID=None, repeat=1, title=None, url=None, template=None, editable=False, adapter=None, selector=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xierpa3.components.theme.Theme

The <b>HelloWorldLayout</b> class implements a basic “Hello, world!” page, running as batch process, saving the result as an HTML file. Also it is available in the example webserver, e.g. through the Xierpa3App.

C¶

alias of Constants

PAGES = ('index', 'other', 'otherworld')¶
TEMPLATE_OTHER1 = 'other'¶
TEMPLATE_OTHER2 = 'otherworld'¶
TITLE = u'The layout version of "Hello, world!" page.'¶
baseComponents()¶

Create a theme site with just one single template home page. Answer a list of page instances that are used as templates for this site.

make(root=None)¶

The instance of this class builds CSS and HTML files at the optional path <b>root</b>. If not defined, then the default ~/Desktop/Xierpa3Examples/[component.name] is used as export path, as set by Builder.DEFAULT_ROOTPATH

class xierpa3.sites.examples.helloworldpages.make.Navigation(components=None, style=None, id=None, parent=None, name=None, css=None, fonts=None, prefix=None, class_=None, type=None, contentID=None, repeat=1, title=None, url=None, template=None, editable=False, adapter=None, selector=None, **kwargs)¶
